about_the_game: Universally agreed upon to be one of the best parts of the game (along with Corey Cruise!), treat your ears to the Postal III Official Soundtrack which comprises a select sampling of The POSTAL Dude's Catharsis adventures covering a veritable roller coaster of genres. It's a cathartic musical delight you won't regret!

content_descriptors.notes: general curse words in songs, nothing major.
